ABOUT_ANAHITA.DESCRIPTION: Anahita, the first Persian restaurant in Athens, has been serving dishes with distinct Eastern flavors for 31 years, from fresh ingredients to authentic recipes. At Anahita you will enjoy a variety of meat and chicken cooked with simple flavors of herbs, rice with saffron, orange rose water and special traditional salads in an ethnic cuisine that is worth trying.
